lead.title: Twelve Games a Year
lead.text: A graphics and games project for 2015

sections.title: project description
sections.text: In 2015 I wanted to develop my plain javascript skills and so started the blog and development process to design and implement 12 original games in a year.

sections.title: my role
sections.text: I designed, did artwork, created architeture and implementation on all the games.

sections.title: technology
sections.text: The whole point of the exercise was to use basic browser technology, along the way I learned a few libraries and tools.

images.title: Phaseball
